description: Controller for handling various log viewing and management operations in the admin panel.

methods.name: app
methods.description: Displays application logs from the database with filtering and pagination.

methods.name: clearAppLogs
methods.description: Clears all application logs from the database.

methods.name: media
methods.description: Displays media-related logs, grouping them by media group ID.

methods.name: telegram
methods.description: Displays Telegram error logs with pagination.

methods.name: deleteTelegramLog
methods.description: Deletes a specific Telegram error log by ID.

methods.name: publicErrorLog
methods.description: Displays the content of the public error log file (public/error_log.txt).

methods.name: viewFileLog
methods.description: Displays the paginated content of a specified log file from the logs/ directory.

methods.name: clearFileLog
methods.description: Clears the content of a specified log file from the logs/ directory.

methods.name: clearPublicErrorLog
methods.description: Clears the content of the public error log file (public/error_log.txt).
